sys_script_include.description: Check if the date is today date
sys_script_include.name: isDateToday

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_8abcca872fb210109d54bea62799b623
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.isDateToday</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Check if the date is today date</description><name>isDateToday</name><script><![CDATA[var isDateToday = Class.create();
isDateToday.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	isDateToday: function(strDate){
		// Create GlideDateTime objects for the current date and the passed in date
		var rightnow = new GlideDateTime();
		var testdate = new GlideDateTime(strDate);
		
		// If the testdate is before rightnow, return true, else return false
		if (testdate.getDate() == rightnow.getDate()) {
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	},
    type: 'isDateToday'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-27 17:59:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>8abcca872fb210109d54bea62799b623</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>isDateToday</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8abcca872fb210109d54bea62799b623</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-27 18:01:31</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
